channel.name: 03-Lookup Web Service
channel.description:
This channel is an example web service that allows information from a database to be queried via HTTP GET.
The Source component listens for GET requests, searches the database for the requested information and responds as either XML or JSON.
The Filter component is not in use.
The Destination component is not in use.
More information: http://wiki.interfaceware.com/1371.html
